Tools

Github Education

You should get verified and enrolled for Github Education Sign-up - make it happen!

  • BSc Students: You should have an email from Admissions stating your student ID and mycit email address. A screenshot of that email should do for registration (include photo of student ID).
  • MSc Students: Full-time - You should have an email from Admissions stating their student ID and mycit email address. A screenshot of that email should do for registration (include photo of student ID).
  • MSc Students: Part-time - Your acceptance letter will not suffice as proof. You will require a signed letter stating you are enrolled in a part-time MSc programme.

Zotero

Download and install Zotero

  • Zotero is a free and open-source reference management software to manage bibliographic data and related research materials (such as PDF files). Please download the desktop application onto your pc/laptop - https://www.zotero.org/download/
  • An add on for Zotero that lets you pull citation counts should also be installed: Zotero Citation Counts
  • Add your papers to Zotero (desktop app, not web app)

Overleaf

Setup an account with Overleaf

  • Overleaf is a collaborative cloud-based LaTeX editor used for writing, editing and publishing scientific documents. Please sign up for an account here here.
